headline: 2 Stocks That Raised Their Dividends in the Last 6 Recessions
summary: On April 2, President Donald Trump announced reciprocal tariffs on 180 countries worldwide, sending shock waves through the market.  Recession fears are returning, and recent market volatility has caused some investors to rethink their investments.  In this challenging environment, dividend stocks are worthy of consideration.
